name: Bedrock
hints: The unbreakable barrier that forms the foundation of the world.
This block is found at the very bottom, where nothing can penetrate.
It defines the limits of the overworld and the Nether alike.
An immovable object, immune to all tools and explosions.
Its presence is a reminder of the boundaries of creation.
The bedrock layer is the ultimate floor of your world, unwavering and eternal.

name: Beehive
hints: Crafted home for bees. Can be harvested for honey.
Crafted home for bees to thrive.
A block where honey comes alive.
Used to farm the honey pure.
It keeps the bees and helps them cure.
Crafted with planks and comb so neat, a beehive's work is truly sweet.

name: Bell
hints: Used to alert villagers of raids. Found in villages.
Rings out loud with a clanging sound.
A block that calls the villagers around.
Used in villages to warn of fright.
It rings the alarm both day and night.
Crafted with gold and iron strong, a bell's ring is never wrong.

name: Blast Furnace
hints: Hot and quick, it smelts so fast.
A furnace that roars with a blazing heat.
A block that makes the ores complete.
Used in villages to smelt with speed.
It's crafted with iron, a builder's need.
Crafted with care, a furnace's might, a block that makes your ores ignite.

name: Blue Ice
hints: In icy realms where frost abounds.
Used to create ice paths and frosty structures.
Slippery and smooth, a skater's dream.
A chilly block by any stream.
It never melts, it never tires.
A slippery block that doesn't melt. Found in cold biomes.
A frosty gem that never expires.

name: Bookshelf
hints: Stores written knowledge. Can be crafted into lecterns.
Words and wisdom fill its shelves, a library for every elf.
Crafted from wood, its pages hold, stories whispered, both new and old.
Librarians cherish its organized might, a beacon of knowledge, both day and night.
Transform it with a lectern's touch, and share your wisdom, oh so much.
Enchanting rooms embrace its lore, for powerful tools and so much more.

name: Campfire
hints: Cooks food and emits light. Found in villages.
Warm and bright, it lights the night.
A block for cooking, a camping delight.
Used in villages and forest glades.
It cooks your food and light pervades.
Crafted from wood and coal combined, a campfire's glow is quite refined.

name: Coal Block
hints: A block that's essential for smelting and cooking alike.
Its black surface speaks of the ancient plant life turned to fuel.
Found abundantly underground, this block is a miner's first find.
The source of warmth and industry, burning bright in the furnace.
Often overlooked, but vital for any industrious builder.
This block's humble appearance hides its crucial role in progress.

name: Cobblestone
hints: Made from breaking down stone. A reliable building block.
Once common stone is broken and chipped.
This rough and ready block leaves builders equipped.
Strong and sturdy, it withstands the test.
Of creeper blasts and zombie's quest.
For castles grand or cozy homes, this block forever roams.

name: Concrete
hints: Solid color block. Crafted from concrete powder.
Solid colors, bright and bold.
A block that's crafted, strong and cold.
Used in builds of modern style.
It adds a touch that's versatile.
Crafted from powder and water's mix, a concrete block is hard to fix.

name: Concrete Powder
hints: Falls like sand. Turns into solid blocks when it comes into contact with water.
Soft and loose, it falls like sand.
A block that shifts from hand to hand.
Used in builds that change and flow.
It turns to concrete with water's glow.
Crafted from dye and gravel blend, a powder's journey finds its end.

name: Copper Block
hints: A metallic block that changes color over time.
Used to create conductive structures.
Crafted from newly mined ores.
Found where the earth's veins run deep.
A block that ages like fine wine.
This block embodies the essence of time and transformation.

name: Diamond Block
hints: The hardest material found in Minecraft. It's shiny!
It's the toughest block around, fit for a king's armor.
This sparkly gem lights up the caves, but beware the pickaxe it takes.
Used for tools that can break anything, this block is a miner's best friend.
Deep underground, where lava flows, this precious treasure glows.
Emerald lovers, rejoice! This block is what they truly voice.

name: Dirt
hints: The most common block. Great for planting things!
The foundation of every build, from humble cottage to grand guild.
Brown and basic, but essential still, for sprouting seeds and giving life its fill.
Walk on it, build on it, or till its earthy soul, this block plays a vital role.
From towering trees to vibrant flowers, this block holds nature's wondrous powers.
Not as glamorous as diamond, but just as important for any farmer's command.

name: Emerald Block
hints: A block that embodies the wealth of villagers and their trade.
Its vibrant green hue is unmistakable, a trader's delight.
More precious than gold in the eyes of many, it sparkles with promise.
Found in the heart of mountains, guarded by stone and ore.
A beacon of prosperity, often used in ornate structures.
The preferred currency of wandering traders and wise merchants.

name: End Stone
hints: In the void where shadows creep.
This block of stone, a fortress keep.
Enduring blasts and dragon's breath.
A sturdy block that laughs at death.
In the dragon's realm, where it's found.
A block found in the End. Resistant to explosions.
A block of strength, unyielding ground.

name: Glowstone
hints: This block shines without a care.
Found hanging from the ceiling of fiery caves.
A beacon bright in the dark.
A luminous block from the Nether, lighting up the dark.
Crafted by the brave, who dare to mine.
A block that glows brightly. Found in the Nether.
A block of light, a treasure divine.

name: Gold Block
hints: A block that glistens with the glow of riches untold.
The soft metal that holds a place in the hearts of the wealthy.
Often found in the company of ancient, dusty pyramids and sunken ships.
Its malleability is legendary, perfect for gilded tools.
From the depths of the earth to the heights of the mountains, it shines.
The currency of the nether's piglins, highly prized and sought after.

name: Hay Bale
hints: Crafted from wheat. Often found in villages.
Golden stack from farmer's yield.
Used in stables, barns, and fields.
Crafted from wheat, it's piled high.
A sight that catches every eye.
In villages, it stands so tall, a block that signifies a bountiful haul.

name: Honey Block
hints: A sticky, golden block produced by bees.
Used to create traps and slow movement.
Crafted from the sweet nectar of flowers.
Found in buzzing bee nests.
A block that captures the essence of summer.
This block is sweet and sticky, like nature's candy.

name: Iron Block
hints: A symbol of strength and durability, used in many a sturdy build.
Essential for crafting the tools of progress, this block is vital.
Found in the depths, where miners toil for its precious ores.
The backbone of industrial machinery and defenses alike.
This block's metallic sheen speaks of unyielding power.
The golems' choice for body armor, a testament to its resilience.

name: Lantern
hints: A light that glows with a gentle hue.
A block that shines both bright and true.
Used in villages to light the way.
It brightens the night and turns it to day.
Crafted with iron and light so grand, a lantern's glow is quite in demand.

name: Lapis Lazuli Block
hints: Crafted from the coldest parts of the world.
This block's azure beauty is more than skin deep, holding magical potential.
Found near the depths, where it mingles with other precious stones.
Its rich color has inspired many a decorative and enchanting endeavor.
A favorite of those who dabble in spells and arcane rituals.
Sought by adventurers for its enchanting properties and striking appearance.

name: Netherite Block
hints: A block forged in the fires of the Nether.
Stronger than diamond, it withstands the test of time.
Crafted from ancient debris, it's the pinnacle of power.
Resistant to fire and lava, it's indestructible.
The ultimate block for the bravest adventurers.
This block represents the height of strength and resilience.

name: Netherrack
hints: In the fiery depths where the Nether lies.
This block burns eternal, a sight for sore eyes.
Its crimson hue lights the dark.
A blazing spark in a realm stark.
Mined by the brave, this block of flame.
A block found in the Nether. Burns forever!
Is the heart of the Nether, its fiery claim.

name: Obsidian
hints: Hard as diamond, strong as steel.
Water meets lava, a hissing sound.
A block that's hard to break. Created by pouring water on lava.
Formed in the fiery depths where water meets lava, this block is nearly unbreakable.
Its dark, glassy surface is the gateway to other dimensions.
A shield against the explosive fury of creepers and other threats.

name: Prismarine
hints: A mystical block from the depths of the ocean.
Used in the construction of underwater temples.
Crafted from shards found in the sea.
Found guarding the secrets of ancient civilizations.
A block that changes color like the ocean waves.
This block holds the mysteries of the deep.

name: Purpur Block
hints: A vibrant purple from the End.
Used in the construction of mysterious End cities.
Crafted from the essence of chorus plants.
Found where shulkers guard their secrets.
A block that embodies the strangeness of the End.
This block pulses with an alien energy.

name: Quartz Block
hints: A pristine white block, favored in elegant and modern builds.
Found in the Nether, where danger and beauty intertwine.
Its smooth surface is perfect for sleek, stylish constructions.
The choice of many builders for its clean, refined look.
Often used in conjunction with other precious materials for a luxurious touch.
This block is a testament to the beauty that can be found in the harshest places.

name: Redstone Block
hints: A block that pulses with energy, powering contraptions far and wide.
The lifeblood of machinery and automation, glowing with potential.
Found deep below, its red glow is unmistakable in the dark.
A staple for engineers and inventors, sparking creativity and innovation.
Its conductive properties make it invaluable for complex builds.
This block is the key to many hidden mechanisms and clever designs.

name: Scaffolding
hints: A block for builders, quick and light.
A block that reaches to the skies.
Temporary block for building. Can be climbed like ladders.
Used to climb and build with ease.
It's crafted from bamboo trees.
Crafted with care, a scaffold's grace, a block that helps you reach the place.

name: Sea Lantern
hints: A block that glows with the light of the sea.
Used to illuminate underwater structures.
Crafted from crystals found in ocean monuments.
Found where guardians protect ancient ruins.
A block that brings light to the darkest depths.
This block captures the essence of the ocean's glow.

name: Sea Pickle
hints: A block that emits light underwater. Found in warm oceans.
In the ocean's depths, where corals sway.
This pickle shines both night and day.
A beacon bright beneath the sea.
A glowing gem, a light so free.
Warm oceans hold this treasure dear.
A pickle's light, a sight so clear.

name: Shroomlight
hints: A glowing block from the Nether's fungi forests.
Used to light up eerie, otherworldly landscapes.
Crafted from the heart of giant mushrooms.
Found where crimson and warped fungi grow.
A block that glows with the light of strange biomes.
This block captures the essence of fungal illumination.

name: Smoker
hints: Slow and steady, it cooks with care.
A furnace that smokes with a gentle air.
A block that cooks the food so rare.
Used in villages to cook with grace.
It's crafted with wood, a chef's embrace.
Crafted with care, a smoker's delight, a block that cooks your food just right.

name: Soul Sand
hints: With every step, a slow descent.
In the Nether's grasp, where souls cry.
This sandy block makes you sigh.
A haunting block, a dark lament.
Souls swirl within its grim domain.
A block that slows you down. Found in the Nether.
A sandy trap, a realm of pain.

name: Sponge
hints: In the ocean's depths, where guardians roam.
This block of sponge makes water its home.
A thirsty block that drinks its fill.
A sponge soaks up with a will.
Ocean monuments guard this prize.
A sponge that dries, a water-wise.
A block that soaks up water. Found in ocean monuments.

name: Terracotta
hints: Colored clay block. Found in mesa biomes.
Colored clay from mesa's ground.
A block with hues that do astound.
Used in builds both old and new.
It adds a color that's tried and true.
Found in biomes of red and gold.

name: Torch
hints: In the dark of night, where shadows loom.
This block of light dispels the gloom.
A torch to guide, a beacon bright.
A flickering flame in the night.
Monsters flee from its warm embrace.
A torch's light, a safe space.
A block that emits light. Can be placed on walls.
